original_text: At Beth Shemesh, King Jehoash of Israel caught the king of Judah, Amaziah, the son of Joash and the grandson of Ahaziah. King Jehoash took him to Jerusalem. He destroyed the wall of Jerusalem, between the Ephraim Gate and the Corner Gate. That part of the wall was 180 metres long.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕 요아스가 벧세메스에서 여호아하스의 손자 요아스의 아들 유다 왕 아마샤를 사로잡고 예루살렘에 이르러 예루살렘 성벽을 에브라임 문에서부터 성 모퉁이 문까지 사백 규빗을 헐고

sentences.original_text: King Jehoash of Israel caught the king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 여호아스가 유다 왕을 사로잡았으니

sentences.original_text: Amaziah, the son of Joash and the grandson of Ahaziah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 요아스의 아들 아하시야의 손자 아마샤였다

sentences.original_text: King Jehoash took him to Jerusalem
He destroyed the wall of Jerusalem
between the Ephraim Gate and the Corner Gate
That part of the wall was 180 metres long
